VideoOverlay.setPeriodEvent

Function/Meaning
Specifying event occurrence at a designated frame
Type
Method of the VideoOverlay class
Syntax
setPeriodEvent(eventFrame)
Arguments
eventFrame Specifies the frame at which the onPeriod event will be triggered.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Triggers the onPeriod event at the specified frame.
The onPeriod event is cleared once it has been triggered. If you want it to trigger again, please set it again using this method.
See Also
VideoOverlay.cancelPeriodEvent
VideoOverlay.onPeriod
